Compatible with iOS 7 - 11

A complete solution to customizing your badges.

Better Mode is a new way of viewing badges. It is discreet and sleek looking. You swipe up on the icon to show the badge, you swipe down to hide it again.

Features
- Better Mode
- Match app colour
- Background blur
- Border (border color)
- Text color
- Shape of badge

* Please note with Better Mode you will have to swipe up and swipe down on the application icon to toggle the badge

Configure options from Settings.
